snippet: WIESEL--Elie. We mourn the passing of Elie Wiesel, who was an emblem of and an advocate for the victims of the Holocaust and the Armenian and other genocides of the 20th century. We thank him for his service as cochairman of the Aurora Prize Selec...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Elie. We mourn the passing of Elie Wiesel, who was an emblem of and an advocate for the victims of the Holocaust and the Armenian and other genocides of the 20th century. We thank him for his service as cochairman of the Aurora Prize Selection Committee. Ruben Vardanyan Noubar Afeyan Vartan Gregorian Cofounders, 100 LIVES and the Aurora Prize for Awakening Humanity 1/3
